name: The Cyclist: Tactics
storyline: Start your career in the amateur league with just yourself as a young cyclist and a local sponsor to secure a few more no-names on the team roster. Manage your team’s race participation and team finances, plan rider fitness peaks, scout for young talent, hire and fire riders, and please your sponsors with good race results to eventually compete for the top spot in the pro league.
summary: A pro cycling turn-based tactics and strategy game. Create your own rider and manage your team throughout career mode, or compete in customizable single races and tours. Manage your resources wisely and outsmart the competition to ride to the top.
